name: In Vitra - JRPG Adventure
description: Is there any truth to those rumours of a mysterious affliction spreading all over -In Vitra- ? The four heroes of this role-playing game with a turn-based combat system embark on an epic quest for a cure – and chance upon a far bigger mystery.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit versions) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or AMD Athlon™ 64 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics 4400 or more, Radeon HD graphics 5430 or more, OpenGL 3.0 or more DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit versions) Processor: CPU: Intel Core or AMD Athlon™ II (K10) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 400 series, AMD Radeon™ HD 5000 series DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
